create_LOD_lists module¶

create_LOD_lists.create_LODdictionary(entry, myclient, lang='en')[source]¶

creates url to Wikidata, Wikipedia an dbpedia (the last depends on langauge) and gets links to LOD calls function ‘get_linksfromWikidata’

Parameters:
  • entry – entity object <class ‘dict’>
  • myclient – connection to db
  • lang – language <class ‘string’>
Returns:

nothing but adds information to entry
create_LOD_lists.get_linksfromWikidata(WD_id, entry, collection)[source]¶

get links to other Databases from dumo

Parameters:
  • WD_id – Wikidata id of enity <class ‘string’>
  • entry – entity object <class ‘dict’>
  • collection – collection to search in
Returns:

entry <class ‘dict’>
create_LOD_lists.read_config(config)[source]¶

Reads the configuration file NECKAr.cfg

Parameters:config – ConfigParser Object
Returns:input collection, list of output collections and the dump collection
